main.java.com.team15.ebrs.dao

Class BikeDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.team15.ebrs.dao.BikeDAO

  • public class BikeDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object class for Bike and BikeData. Provides necessary database interaction regarding the specified objects.
    Author:
    Team 15
    See Also:
    Bike, BikeData

    • Method Detail

      • getAllBikes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bike> getAllBikes()
        Returns an ArrayList of all bikes. Bikes previously deleted but still in the system will not be included.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with Bike objects

      • getAllBikes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bike> getAllBikes(int dockingStationId)
        Fetches all bikes registered at the specified docking station.
        Parameters:
        dockingStationId - Specify which dockingstation you want to get all bikes from.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Bikes at the selected docking station.

      • getAllAvailableBikes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bike> getAllAvailableBikes()
        Returns all Bikes registered to the system that is available, meaning not having any unfinished repairs nor having stationId set to null.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with available Bikes.

      • getAllRecentData

        public java.util.ArrayList<BikeData> getAllRecentData()
        Finds the most recent BikeData for all active bikes in the system.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of BikeData.

      • getAllBikeData

        public java.util.ArrayList<BikeData> getAllBikeData(Bike bike)
        Returns all BikeData registered for the specified Bike.
        Parameters:
        bike - The Bike you want to retrieve all BikeData about.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of BikeData.

      • getAllTravellingData

        public java.util.ArrayList<BikeData> getAllTravellingData()
        Returns recent BikeData for all Bikes currently travelling.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of BikeData.

      • editBike

        public boolean editBike(Bike bike)
        Edits a Bike registered in the database matching the specified bikeId.
        Parameters:
        bike - The edited version of the bike you want in the database.
        Returns:
        Boolean stating whether the editing of the bike in the system was successful.

      • deleteBike

        public int deleteBike(Bike bike)
        Sets active BIT to FALSE (0) in the database for the specified Bike, which hides it from the application. No data will be deleted. The deletion checks for matching bikeId in the database.
        Parameters:
        bike - The specified Bike you want deleted.
        Returns:
        Int stating whether the deletion of the bike in the system was successful. 0 - deleted, 1 - not deleted, 2 - not found.

      • addBike

        public boolean addBike(Bike bike,
                       DockingStation dock)
        Adds a bicycle to the database. If no DockingStation is specified, the method will check for BikeData within the Bike. If there's no BikeData, the "Company's" standard coordinates will be used.
        Parameters:
        bike - The Bike object being added to the database. Any bikeId set will be ignored as this is decided by the existing bikes already registered.
        dock - The DockingStation the bike is added to. Null if the bike shouldn't be set to a DockingStation.
        Returns:
        boolean stating whether the registration to the system was successful.

      • findBike

        public boolean findBike(int bikeId)
        Mostly used as a help method in various methods to quick check if the specified bikeId is registered in the database
        Parameters:
        bikeId - The specified bikeId you want to find.
        Returns:
        Boolean stating whether the Bike was found in the system.

      • getBike

        public Bike getBike(int bikeId)
        Returns a Bike matching the bikeId specified. Null if the bikeId is not found.
        Parameters:
        bikeId - The bikeId of the wanted Bike object.
        Returns:
        The specifed Bike object.

      • getBikeDataFromRS

        public BikeData getBikeDataFromRS(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
        Help method used in varous methods in BikeDAO. Fetches a BikeData object from the specified ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        rs - ResultSet containing enough columns to create a BikeData object.
        Returns:
        A BikeData object. Null if no info is found.

      • addBikeData

        public boolean addBikeData(BikeData bd,
                           int tripId)
        Adds BikeData to the system. If tripId = 0 then no trip will be connected to this BikeData
        Parameters:
        bd - BikeData object that is being added to the database.
        tripId - tripId, 0 if no trip is connected.
        Returns:
        Boolean stating whether the BikeData was stored successfully.

      • getRecentData

        public BikeData getRecentData(Bike bike)
        Returns the newest BikeData registered for the specified Bike.
        Parameters:
        bike - The desired Bike you will retrieve BikeData from.
        Returns:
        A BikeData object with the newest data for the Bike.

      • getNumOfTravellingBikes

        public int getNumOfTravellingBikes()
        Method used for simulation. Stations need to know when all bikes are finished.
        Returns:
        Number of bikes currently travelling.

      • getNumOfBikes

        public int getNumOfBikes(DockingStation dock)
